name: Fox Golf
description:
Do we do a “little” activity? The Fox Golf game opens up a new vision of the sport of golf. The basic idea remains the same, but the difficulties and circumstances will surprise you.As a fox, the biggest competition you have ever met on the golf courses awaits you. Try your sports skills right now, aiming at the target even from the greatest distances. Humanity needs new heroes, so be one of them!

Game features:
  • 100 levels
  • Fields above the clouds
  • 10 chances to miss per level
